full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` NAD GDON GYI ZUG TU GLUD DU GDON THABS KANGKA MDO SPU GRI CHOG KHUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES NAD GDON GYI ZUG TU MYUR DU GDON PA'I THABS, KANGKA SPU GRI TSIG ZHUR ZHES PA 'DI NI SOG SKAD KYI DPE CHA GNYIS GSUM RTZOM ZHAL 'KHANG BYAS TE, SOG SKAD MI SHIS RNAM LA PHAN SNYAM PAS BOD SKAD BSGYUR NAS SLOB PA THA SHAL BA SU MA TI AARTHA SIDHI MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,MKHAS PAR RDZOM BU RNAM MI KHEL BAR ZHU, SEMS CAN THAMS CAD LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
author_simple: SU MA TI AARTHA SIDDHI MING CAN,
